des:
Happy Karma is a brand new smart home skill, lets you easily control, monitor, and secure your home from anywhere in the world. Start with HK networks product to create a smart home that matches your unique personality.

With smart home skill Happy Karma, you can many controls as follow.
-Control and manage all kinds of devices like air conditioners, TV, audio, smart plug, projector and etc . 

Trying saying 
"Alexa, turn on Plug"
"Alexa, turn down volume on TV"
"Alexa, mute on Audio"
"Alexa, unmute on Audio"
"Alexa, play on Audio"
"Alexa, stop on Audio"
"Alexa, pause Audio"
"Alexa, resume Audio"
"Alexa, fast forward on Audio"
"Alexa, rewind on Audio"
"Alexa, switch input to HDMI one on projector"
"Alexa, next channel on TV"

Particular attention:
Happy Karma support these products: sPlug, mBox.
